Ref: CXP084/2024

Criteria:

  • Grade 12 + Financial Diploma / Degree
  • 2-3 Years experience in the financial administration field
  • Exposure to technical aspects in the Transport Environment is advantageous
  • Advanced computer skills (Excel, Word, Outlook)
  • Excellent communication skills, problem-solving abilities and attention to detail
  • Reliable and dependable and able to work well under pressure
  • Must be proactive and take initiative
  • Must have own transport

Apply via website or atlternatively via: https://bluffpersonnel.com/apply/
